attributes.action: Provide daily Covid Briefing for England
attributes.additional_details: There are daily Covid briefings for Scotland, Wales and Northern Island but nothing for the largest country in the UK, England. There are often televised briefing aired for these counties for English viewers, yet there is no daily briefing for England. The first minister of Scotland has said her ability to communicate directly with the public is "more important than ever".
attributes.background: Provide a daily Covid Briefing for England, summarising the current statistics and measures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329874
